data.description:
For the rest of the scene, you can use your action to activate your EQUINOX WARD. While active:

  • Youʼre permanently Locked, and gain 3 Inertia at the start of your turn.
  • Matched allies deal +2 Harm with all weapons, and gain full Inertia from your Equilibrium passive instead of half.
  • Attacks and powers from foes that arenʼt Matched to you have their Impact reduced by 2 and donʼt apply Statuses.

You can deactivate EQUINOX WARD at any time. Activate it now.
